mapper.select: SELECT D.id, D.date, O.order_number AS O_order_number, LP.lease_plant_number AS O_LP_lease_plant_number, LP.name AS O_LP_name, LP.short_name AS O_LP_short_name, LP.identifier AS O_LP_identifier, DE.destination_id AS O_DE_destination_id, DE.name AS O_DE_name, DE.short_name AS O_DE_short_name, DE.identifier AS O_DE_identifier, OS.order_status_id AS O_OS_order_status_id, OS.name AS O_OS_name, OS.identifier AS O_OS_identifier FROM dispatches D INNER JOIN orders O ON O.dispatch_id = D.id INNER JOIN lease_plants LP ON LP.lease_plant_number = O.lease_plant_numer INNER JOIN destinations DE ON D.id = DE.destination_id INNER JOIN order_statuses OS ON OS.order_status_id = O.order_status_id WHERE D.id = #{dispatch_id}
